column2: "The Oracle Fleet--a vast armada assembled to explore the depths of space."
"With it, we stepped beyond interplanetary space into the vast"
"outer reaches, beginning a new age of travel between the stars."
"And from its crew emerged a squad of elites known as ARKS."
"Drawn from the four races of the Oracle fleet,"
"and tasked with the exploration of each new frontier, these men and women form the vanguard of our expansion."
"Casts, sentient juggernauts of circuitry and alloy."
"Each race complements the next, extending our reach fourfold."
"And your next destination. Don't let your guard down."
